casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donald Durrant FARROW 341P12-5 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Donald Durrant Farrow, for Farrow, Donald Durrant. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of November 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018." Ervin, J. recused
